sentences.en: And by applying biogas slurry, photosynthesis rates is 16.622 μ mol · cm - 2· s - 1 , improving 26.029 % by CK.
sentences.cn: 当单施沼液时, 光合速率平均值达到16.622μmol.cm -2.s-1, 高出对照26.029%.

sentences.en: As the ocean warms, it becomes more stratified, with the warmer water remaining at the top where the organisms need to be in order to do photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 但是随着海水变暖，它的层次会更加分明，温度更高的海水会停留在表面，而这里正是生物体进行光合作用必需的地方。

sentences.en: Exogenous applications of indoleacetic acid, kinetin or gibberellic acid stimulate photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 吲哚乙酸, 激动素或赤霉酸的外源施用刺激了光合作用.

sentences.en: Field - grown plants generally had higher photosynthesis rates than chamber - grown plants.
sentences.cn: 田间种植的植株通常比室内种植的植株光合率高.

sentences.en: Glycolate has long been recognized as an early and important product of photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 乙醇酸早就被认为是光合作用早期的重要的产物.

sentences.en: In apple trees photosynthesis occurs almost exclusively in the leaves.
sentences.cn: 苹果树的光合作用几乎只发生在叶内.

sentences.en: It has at least one gene necessary for photosynthesis—so far it’s the only animal known with this ability.
sentences.cn: 它有至少一个基因是光合作用所必需的——到目前为止这是唯一被发现具有此项能力的动物。

sentences.en: Measurement of photosynthesis in sediments and macrophytes cannot be undertaken by means of any single procedure.
sentences.cn: 沉积物和大型植物光合作用的测定不能通过任何单一的程序来承担.

sentences.en: Our current research topic is photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 我们现在研究的课题是光合作用。

sentences.en: Rates of leaf photosynthesis have little relationship to yield.
sentences.cn: 叶片的光合作用速率与产量的关系不大.

sentences.en: Some of the carbon dioxide absorbed by plants during photosynthesis is radioactive.
sentences.cn: 植物在光合作用中吸收的一些二氧化碳具有放射性.

sentences.en: The belt of vegetation that crosses Africa below the Sahara is very dark because most of the sunlight is absorbed by plants for photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 在撒哈拉沙漠下方，横贯非洲中部的植被带颜色非常深，因为植物由于光合作用吸收了大多数太阳光。

sentences.en: The Chlamydomonas are of particular interest because they exhibit phototaxis-an ability to orient themselves toward light sources to aid in photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 对衣藻的关注是由于它具有趋光性——一种能够跟随光源定位自身以帮助光合作用的能力。

sentences.en: The first carbohydrates produced in soybean photosynthesis are trioses, 3 - phosphoglyceric acid and glycerate.
sentences.cn: 大豆光合作用所产生的最初碳水化合物是丙醣, 三磷酸甘油酸和甘油酸盐.

sentences.en: The light saturation curve of soybean photosynthesis has been determined by a number of workers.
sentences.cn: 许多研究者曾测得了大豆光合作用的光饱和曲线.

sentences.en: The photosynthesis and the azotaseactivity were decreased in Mo deficient soybean.
sentences.cn: 缺钼大豆的光合作用和固氮酶活性降低.

sentences.en: The products of photosynthesis are also converted into other complex substances.
sentences.cn: 光合作用的产物还转变为其他的复杂物质.

sentences.en: This process called photosynthesis sustains almost all life on Earth.
sentences.cn: 这个过程叫做光合作用,它使地球上几乎所有的生命得以维持.

sentences.en: Undoubtedly many different reactions contributed to the overall stoichiometry of photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 无疑,这种光合作用的总的化学计量学中,包含有许多不同的反应.

words.tran_cn: [生化] 光合的；光合作用的

phrases.tran_cn: 净光合作用；净光能合成

trans.tran_en: the production by a green plant of special substances like sugar that it uses as food, caused by the action of sunlight on  chlorophyll (= the green substance in leaves )
